onboarding_interact_vo_triggers.description: [string]Contains in order the vo_triggers that we should use when we interact with the shipmaster while in onboarding

idle_vo_triggers.description: [string]Contains in order the vo_triggers that we are going to use when the ship master is idle for more than the dialogue_idle_time_threshold

dialogue_idle_time_threshold.description: Indicates how much time it should wait in idle until it triggers a WorldBuildingDialogue
